tool_description: Get quotes from a collection of 75000 quotes! The Quote of the Day API offers motivational content, perfect for any app. It includes authors and genres, making it easy to engage users with inspiring messages.
name: Quote of the Day API
title: Quote of the Day API

api_list.name: Random Quotes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quote-of-the-day-api.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quote-of-the-day-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://quote-of-the-day-api.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quote-of-the-day-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description: Get Quote in json format using "GET" request .
